hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

GC (Medigoron).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #the Serenade of Water#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #3# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.
